name: The VR Simulation
description:
Welcome to the VR Simulation Here you can download ad-ons! Simulate The VR Device on your laptop!  Start Off Using the default map and expand and make new ones for others to play. You can make or play anything you would like, You can download hand models and maps to improv your experience on the game or make on for your own! You Own your own map create online walls custom cars, Hand models and much more. Create anything you Would Like And Have Fun! (Disclaimer PLEASE READ) The VR Simulation is meant to ONLY Be played on Laptop and not Vr!.

Link to tutorials; HAND EDITOR TUTORIAL TUTORIALS and MAP EDITOR TUTORIALS
